item.description:
Seems saturday is a special day for Deb S. and she would like to go bowling, but of course go to the Abington Ale House for dinner first.
I have made reservations for the Ale House at 6:00 and reserved 3 lanes at Timberlanes down the road for 7:00 till midnight. (bowling will be dirt cheap)
Could you please forward this invitation to the group. It will be fun as it usually is and maybe the newbies can get a taste of what we do in the winter months...
Thanks a lot hope to see you there.
Judi
P.S.
Anyone that is sure they want to come could you please rsvp to: goneridingvtx@verizon.net Thanks agan Judi :)
item.name: Bowling (Yes, again!)
